All future pill drops (including Mom's Coin Purse) will now instead become Tarot card drops.
An item only available in the Shop room.

title: Steam Sale
info: Items in the shop are now -50% off, rounded down to the nearest whole number.

title: Stem Cells
info: +1 Health Up.
+0.16 Shot Speed Up.

title: Steven
info: +1 Damage Up.
Has a chance to drop from the Steven boss fight.
unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Basement 40 times and defeating the Steven boss.

title: Stigmata
info: +1 Health Up.
+0.3 Damage Up.
tags: item room, treasure room, item room pool

title: Stop Watch
pickup: Let's slow this down a bit
info: Gives a permanent slowing effect to all enemies in the room and their projectiles.
The slowing effect has a reduced effect against Brimstone lasers fired by enemies.
unlock: Unlock this item by donating 999 pennies to the Shop.
tags: shop room pool, shop item pool, stopwatch

title: Strange Attractor
info: Enemies and pickups (keys, bombs etc.) are now magnetically attracted to Isaac's tears.
Can cause some enemies to have unpredictable movement.
tags: item room, treasure room, item room pool

title: Super Bandage
info: +1 Health Up.
+2 Soul Hearts
unlock: Unlock this item by making a Super Bandage Girl.
tags: boss room pool, boss room item, item room, treasure room, item room pool, the lost item pool

title: Synthoil
info: +1.0 Damage Up.
+5.25 Range Up.
+0.5 Tear Height.
tags: boss room pool, boss room item, syringe

title: Tammy's Head
info: Fires 10 tears in a circle around Isaac.
Each tear is equal to your damage stat + 25 flat damage.
Synergizes very well with most tear effects including tear modifiers like Mom's Knife and Brimstone.
tags: golden chest pool, gold chest pool,

title: Taurus
info: -0.3 Speed Down.
While in a hostile room your speed raises at a rate of 0.065 per second.

When you hit a speed stat of 2.0, Isaac will gain the My Little Unicorn invincibility effect for a few seconds, increasing speed and allowing him to run into enemies to deal 40 contact damage per hit.
The time it takes for the effect to activate becomes shorter with a higher base Speed stat.
One of the twelve zodiac items available in the game.
tags: astrology, astronomy, item room, treasure room, item room pool

title: Tech.5
info: Gives Isaac a laser which is positioned in the centre of his head and will fire at random intervals while firing tears.
Each laser does damage equal to your current tear damage.
Luck has no effect on the rate at which Tech.5 fires and does not scale with items that increase your tears stat.
unlock: Unlock this item by beating Challenge #18.
tags: technology.5, item room, treasure room, item room pool

title: Technology
info: Isaac's tears are replaced with a laser that has unlimited range and can only fire at right angles.
Lasers travel through enemies but not rocks.
tags: item room, treasure room, item room pool

title: Technology 2
info: Isaac now also has a laser which fires continuously and does damage very rapidly.
-35% Damage Down.
tags: item room, treasure room, item room pool

title: Telepathy for Dummies
info: When used, Isaac gains homing shots for the current room.
tags: library pool, library room, book room pool, item room, treasure room, item room pool, yellow book how to

title: Teleport
info: Teleports Isaac to a random location on the map.
Has a very small chance to teleport you to the I AM ERROR room.
tags: item room, treasure room, item room pool, blue remote

title: There's Options
info: Two items now spawn after beating a boss, however only one can be taken.
Appears in the shop pool.
Unlocked by donating to the donation machine in the shop.
unlock: Unlock this item by donating 50 pennies to the Shop.
tags: shop room pool, shop item pool,

title: Thunder Thighs
pickup: HP + speed down + you feel strong
info: +1 Health Up.
-0.4 Speed Down.
You can now break poop, rocks and skulls by walking over them.
Allows you to crush Red Poops and sometimes not take damage. However, If you also have flying you will always take damage.
tags: item room, treasure room, item room pool

title: Tiny Planet
info: +7.0 Tear Height.
Tears now revolve around Isaac's Body at the distance of an attack fly.
tags: item room, treasure room, item room pool

title: Toothpicks
info: +0.7 Tears Up.
+0.16 Shot Speed Up.
Does not increase your damage, simply makes your tears red.
tags: boss room pool, boss room item,

title: Torn Photo
info: +0.7 Tears Up.
+0.16 Shot Speed Up.
tags: boss room pool, boss room item,

title: Tough Love
info: Isaac has a random chance to fire a tooth shot instead of a tear sometimes.
Teeth shots deal damage equal to your tear damage * 3.2.
The chance to fire a tooth is affected by your luck stat and at +9 Luck it will activate every time.
Synergizes well with some tear modifiers such as Ipecac, which causes it to do massive damage.
tags: item room, treasure room, item room pool

title: Transcendence
info: Gives Isaac the ability to fly.
unlock: Unlock this item by beating Mom's Heart 3 times.
tags: secret room pool, the lost item pool

title: Treasure Map
info: Reveals the entire map for every floor not including the secret room locations.
Does not show the icons for any unknown rooms.
tags: normal beggar pool, normal judgement pool, coin beggar pool, coin judgement pool, shop room pool, shop item pool,

title: Trinity Shield
info: Puts a shield in front of Isaac which blocks projectiles.
tags: angel room pool, god room pool, angel room item

title: Undefined
info: Upon use, teleports you to one of the following rooms at random: Item room, Secret room, Super secret room, the I AM ERROR room or the Black Market (very low chance).

Allows you to loop through and the final floor infinitely. If you can get Undefined to teleport you to an I AM ERROR room, there will be a beam of light that takes you back to a new Chest/Dark Room floor with the same layout and refreshed rooms.
unlock: Unlock this item by beating Boss Rush with Eden.
tags: item room, treasure room, item room pool

title: Unicorn Stump
info: When used, turns Isaac invincible and gains +0.28 speed for a few seconds.
You cannot fire tears while the stump is active.
Very similar to the My Little Unicorn item but does not deal contact damage.
tags: item room, treasure room, item room pool

title: Virgo
info: A random chance when you take damage to get an invincibility shield for a few seconds (Similar to the Celtic Cross effect but more likely).
The chance to get an invincibility shield is affected by your luck stat and at +10 Luck it will activate every time you get hit.
Gives you the PhD effect, turning all negative pills into positive ones.
One of the twelve zodiac items available in the game.
tags: astrology, astronomy, item room, treasure room, item room pool

title: The Virus
info: Deals poison damage on contact with enemies (Damage over time 4 or 6 per tick).
This item is not a speed down like it was in the original game.
tags: demon beggar pool, demon judgement pool, devil beggar pool, item room, treasure room, item room pool, syringe, needle, injection, the lost item pool

title: The Wafer
info: Lowers all damage taken by half rounding up to the nearest half-heart.
The Wafer becomes most effective in the Womb and beyond where enemies all deal a whole heart of damage.
The Wafer causes the Sharp Plug item to only cost 1/2 a heart per use.
tags: angel room pool, god room pool, angel room item, item room, treasure room, item room pool, communion, the lost item pool

title: We Need To Go Deeper
info: Spawns a trapdoor at Isaac's feet which allows him to travel to the next floor.
The trapdoor has a small chance (roughly 1/10) to become a Black Market.
tags: secret room pool, devil pool, devil room pool, devil deal

title: White Pony
info: Allows Isaac to fly while the White Pony is held.
Sets your speed stat to 1.5 if it isn't already that high.
Has a spacebar effect which is the same as the Crack the Sky item, which spawns white beams of light from the sky that deal 20 damage to enemies.
The charge of the spacebar attack deals 40 damage on contact with enemies.
Drops from the Conquest boss fight.

title: Whore of Babylon
info: When you only have half a heart remaining, you enter a curse state which adds +1.5 damage and +0.3 speed.
When playing as Eve, this item activates with one FULL heart remaining, unlike the other characters.
One of Eve's starting items.
tags: devil pool, devil room pool, devil deal

title: Wire Coat Hanger
info: +0.7 Tears Up.
unlock: Unlock this item by beating Mom's Heart 4 times.
tags: boss room pool, boss room item,

title: Wooden Spoon
info: +0.3 Speed Up.
tags: boss room pool, boss room item,

title: X-Ray Vision
info: Reveals the entrance to secret rooms and automatically opens the hole, removing the need for bombs to enter.
tags: item room, treasure room, item room pool, xray vision, xray glasses

title: Yum Heart
info: Heals Isaac for one whole red heart.
